overview: An angel is quietly praying at a sanctuary in Heaven. She sees a vision of the struggles and sufferings of five people living on earth.  Fuka, a fifth grade elementary schooler, is bullied by her classmates. Yuya, a Fukushima high school student, wants to study at a Tokyo university. His father rejects this due to money issues. Yoshino is an actress diagnosed with terminal cancer. Unwilling to accept this, she goes to Tokushima as a last resort to treat her illness. Mamoru's will to become a politician to save Japan is fading, as he ran for national election and failed three times. Misato wants to become an actress, but lost her purpose in life after the death of her sister.  The angel decides to come down to earth to help and give love to those people. How will the angel save the people of today who have lost their belief in the invisible? What will happen to these five people?
title: I'm Fine, My Angel
